trans-unit.source: Represents a set of selected dates in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表一組中選取日期<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Dates can be added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 日期可以加入到此<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, adding a date or a range to the SelectedDatesCollection may cause it to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，將日期或範圍加入至 SelectedDatesCollection 可能造成它清除。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>影響<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: |CalendarSelectionMode|Effect on SelectedDates| |---------------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|No selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: |CalendarSelectionMode |SelectedDates 影響 | |---------------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|不允許選取。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> cannot be set and no values can be added to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Only a single date can be selected, either by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> or the first value in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>無法設定並沒有值可加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|可以選取單一日期，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>的第一個值或</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> cannot be used.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|A single range of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>無法使用。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|可以選取單一的日期範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will clear all previous values from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>、 個別附加日期來<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>，或是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>將會清除所有先前的值從<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|可以選取多個非連續的日期範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will not clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>透過<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>將不會清除<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>或個別附加日期

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> will still clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, but additional dates or ranges can then be added.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>仍將會清除<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>，但可新增其他的日期或範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.|
trans-unit.target: 加入包含已選取的某些日期的範圍或與另一個範圍重疊導致範圍的聯集並不會造成例外狀況。 |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> associated with this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref>與此集合相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Adds all the dates in the specified range, which includes the first and last dates, to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在指定範圍中，其中包含的第一個和最後一個日期，將集合的所有日期。

trans-unit.source: The first date to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的第一個日期。

trans-unit.source: The last date to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的最後一個日期。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
